column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////My boyfriend and I stopped by around 9:15 on a Thursday morning. The hostess told us there would be a 25-30 minute wait but we were seated in about 10. Once we were seated
column2: the waitress promptly asked us if we wanted anything to drink. We both got coffee
column3: which turned out to be pretty average. After a few minutes
column4: she returned and took our orders. I got two eggs sunny side up
column6: chicken sausage and the berry bliss pancakes. My boyfriend got the cinnamon roll pancakes.
